ThingDef.label: TekCentipedeBlaster
ThingDef.description:
A new mechanoid centipede manufactured by Sparrow Tek Industries, taking on a sleek black body adorned with neon lights, this centipede stands out as a futuristic marvel. It incorporates hybrid technologies that blend the best of mechanoid and human engineering. 

 The Tek Centipede Blaster is equipped with advanced upgrades to its weaponry, body, and design, pushing its speed, attack power, and defenses to the absolute limit. 

 It features a built-in shield generator and modifications to its body, adding a 7th body ring, leaving extra critical components in its 6th body ring, allowing it to remain active even in the most dangerous firefights. This comes at the expense of additional bandwidth. 

 The custom weapon integrated into the Tek Centipede applies fire damage to its targets, solidifying its role as a formidable force on the frontlines. 

 Rigorous testing has been conducted to safeguard against hacking attempts by mechanoid hiveminds, with thousands of checks implemented to ensure its security. Nevertheless, to fully utilize these preventative measures, the unit still requires the oversight of a Mechinator. 

 <color=#FF0000> This mechanoid is part of the TEK red series.</color>

ThingDef.label: TekCentipedeGuardian
ThingDef.description:
A new mechanoid manufactured by Sparrow Tek Industries, the Tek Centipede Guardian is an extremely expensive mechanoid built with hybrid technologies using the best of mechanoid and human engineering to create the best mechs on the market. 

 The Tek Centipede Guardian was created when the need for search and rescue operations arose, but battlefield conditions or mission profiles disallowed the use of a medical combat squad. It has built-in solar panels on its hexagon-shaped faceplate, reducing power consumption to allow extended rescue operations. While this centipede is slower than other Tek Centipede types, the Tek Centipede Guardian has tremendous durability. It also features a much stronger shield dome and an EMP grenade turret, operating as a mobile support weapons platform. 

 The Guardian also comes with three crypto caskets onboard, allowing it to pick up and store injured units, putting a complete stop to medical emergencies on the battlefield. This gives fireteams the time they need to rescue their own without the cost of more lives, making this mechanoid extremely useful for caravans or very grueling military operations. 

<color=#0026FF> This mechanoid is part of the TEK blue series.</color>

captureCommand.label: Capture pawn
captureCommand.description: Capture and store a pawn in an inner crypto storage.

releaseCommand.label: Release {0}
releaseCommand.description: Release {0} from the inner crypto storage.

ThingDef.label: Tek Medi Bubble
ThingDef.description: A new mechanoid manufactured by Sparrow Tek Industries, The Tek Medi bubble is a non-combat based mechanoid designed to assist with medical tasks as well as fire fighting tasks, the medibubble's body consists of a large bubble-like sphere that can act as a crypto sleeping casket storing up to 5 people inside, anyone inside the bubble will be frozen in deep sleep, they can be then taken to a medical facility for treatment, the medibubble also uses a fire foam cannon to put out fires very quickly, this mech has next to no combat abilities to its name, so its best to keep it away from the frontlines until the battle is over. \n\n<color=#0026FF> This mechanoid is part of the TEK blue series.</color>

captureCommand.label: Capture pawn
captureCommand.description: Capture and store a pawn in the CryptoBioBubble.

releaseCommand.label: Release {0}
releaseCommand.description: Release {0} from the inner crypto CryptoBioBubble.

ThingDef.label: Tek Quadraxis
ThingDef.description: The Quadraxis is a new custom mechanoid designed by Sparrow Tek Industries, specialized for melee combat. This mechanoid has a durasteel heavy frame, and 2 shield generators making it extremely difficult to take down, However this forces it to move very slowly, to counter act this, It features weak dual blasters mounted on its head for minimal ranged defense. The legs consist of a blade-like crystalline metallic material which are infused with fast-moving mechanites along their edges, allowing the Quadraxis to slice through plasteel effortlessly, making it a formidable adversary in close-quarters combat. the Quadraxis is very weak to EMPs \n\n<color=#FF0000> This mechanoid is part of the TEK red series.</color>

ThingDef.label: Quadmin
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid 4 legged bot possibly designed to mimic Sparrow Tek's Quadraxis, The Quadmin is very much like a pikemin, unlike the pikemin it isn't weak to close range combat due to its massive blade like legs, it has an upgraded needle gun as well making this mechanoid very dangerous from close and afar, This mech is slow and is very weak to EMP attacks.

ThingDef.label: Tek Lancer Red
ThingDef.description:
A new mechanoid manufactured by Sparrow Tek Industries, The red Tek lancer is an upgraded lancer, it has slightly heavier armor plating and a personal sheild, it can withstand a decent amount of damage before going down. Its still somewhat fagile like most lancers, it also has a chance to spawn with fire based weapons. A special feature that comes with red lancers is the shoulder grenade launcher which fires tek firebombs as a secondary weapon. 

<color=#FF0000> This mechanoid is part of the TEK red series.</color> 

<color=#FF0000> Please be careful when using this lancer as it will fire these tek bombs at will, even indoors, the launcher can be disabled when selected.</color>

ThingDef.label: Tek Lancer Blue
ThingDef.description: A new mechanoid manufactured by Sparrow Tek Industries, The blue Tek lancer is an upgraded lancer, it has much heavier armor plating and a personal sheild, allowing it to take alot of hits before going down, Its still somewhat fagile like most lancers, it also has a chance to spawn with EMP based weapons. A special feature that comes with blue lancers is the jump pack that allows it to close the gap. \n\n<color=#0026FF> This mechanoid is part of the TEK blue series.</color>

ThingDef.label: Tek Defender
ThingDef.description: The Tek Defender is a mechanoid manufactured by SparrowTek Industries. Defenders are hardy, small but heavy mechanoids designed to hold the line with their bulletproof front shields. They're fast and heavy but not very accurate or deadly their sloppy but high rate of fire is designed to ward off riots and large mobs. They make for an excellent police force.
